data.expected_result: The authy app should redirect to authy app and Google authenticator to Google authenticator
data.short_description: The authy app link in the 2FA login screen redirects to Google authenticator and vice versa
data.steps_to_repro: - Enable 2FA - Log out of your account and enter your account details but don't enter your 2FA code yet - Click the two-factor authentication button next to the pop up menu  - Click on either of the 2 app names
